argument.value: IsolatedStorage.CurrentSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the current size use IsolatedStorage.UsedSize
IsolatedStorage.MaximumSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the maximum size use IsolatedStorage.Quota
IsolatedStorageFile.CurrentSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the current size use IsolatedStorageFile.UsedSize
IsolatedStorageFile.MaximumSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the maximum size use IsolatedStorageFile.Quota
This property has been deprecated. Please use IsolatedStorageFileStream's SafeFileHandle property instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202
